testcase.classname: Application scope and Create/Update/Read/Delete options feature validation
testcase.name: Verify session scope value gets retained and destroyed when session ends

testcase.classname: Application scope and Create/Update/Read/Delete options feature validation
testcase.name: Verify application scope value gets retained and not destroyed when session ends

failure.message: 1 expectation failed. JSON path previousMessage doesn't match. Expected: null Actual: Karthiga
